summary: This document is an email from Lesley Groff to Paul Morris regarding a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. Lesley requests to confirm a specific time for the meeting, indicating a level of organization and planning in their interactions.

events.description: Lesley Groff sends an email to Paul Morris to confirm a meeting time with Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff is organizing a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
The meeting is scheduled for 5:15 PM on June 25, 2013.
Paul Morris is the recipient of the email and is being asked to attend the meeting.
